SELECT a.*,c.`name` curOperatorName,b.name creatorName,d.`nodeName` FROM m_production a LEFT JOIN p_staff b ON a.`creatorId` = b.id LEFT JOIN p_staff c ON a.`curOperatorId` = c.`Id` LEFT JOIN f_flownode d ON a.`flowId` = a.`flowId` AND a.`curNode` = d.`Id` where 1=1
SELECT c.`prdNo`,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`mtlQty`,d.`colorName`,a.* FROM m_productionitem a,c_product c,c_product_color d WHERE a.pid = ? AND a.prdId = c.id AND d.`Id` = a.prdColorId

SELECT count(1) FROM m_production a LEFT JOIN p_staff b ON a.`creatorId` = b.id LEFT JOIN p_staff c ON a.`curOperatorId` = c.`Id` LEFT JOIN f_flownode d ON a.`flowId` = a.`flowId` AND a.`curNode` = d.`Id` where 1=1

UPDATE nxs=nxs+?,ns=ns+?,nm=nm+?,nl=nl+?,nxl=nxl+?,nxxl=nxxl+?,nxxxl=nxxxl+?,nunno=nunno+? where prdId=? and prdColorId = ?
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_store WHERE prdId =? AND prdColorId = ?
SELECT b.prdNo,c.colorName,a.* FROM t_store a,c_product b,c_product_color c WHERE a.`prdId` = b.id AND a.`prdColorId` = c.id

SELECT c.id,c.`prdNo`,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`prdName`, d.`colorName`,d.`colorNo`,c.`mtlQty`,SUM(b.`prdNum`) prdNum, SUM(IF(b.mntState=0,0,b.`prdNum`)) prdingNum,SUM(b.`subTotal`) subTotal,SUM(b.`ns`) ns, SUM(b.`nm`) nm,SUM(b.`nl`) nl,SUM(b.`nxl`) nxl,SUM(b.`nxxl`) nxxl FROM r_order a,r_orderitem b,c_product c,c_product_color d WHERE a.id = b.orderId AND b.`prdId` = c.`Id` AND b.`prdColorId` = d.`Id` AND d.`isVaild` = 0 AND a.`oprState` = 0 AND a.`curNode` = 5 AND b.oprState = 0 AND c.prdNo LIKE ? GROUP BY c.id,c.`prdNo`,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`prdName`,d.`colorName`,d.`colorNo`,c.`mtlQty` ORDER BY REPLACE(c.`prdNo`,'16','99') ASC

SELECT r.*,s.* FROM (SELECT c.id,c.`prdNo`,d.id colorId,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`prdName`, d.`colorName`,SUM(b.`prdNum`) prdNum,SUM(b.`ns`) ons, SUM(b.`nm`) onm,SUM(b.`nl`) onl,SUM(b.`nxl`) onxl,SUM(b.`nxxl`) onxxl FROM r_order a,r_orderitem b,c_product c,c_product_color d WHERE a.id = b.orderId AND b.`prdId` = c.`Id` AND b.`prdColorId` = d.`Id` AND d.`isVaild` = 0 AND a.`oprState` = 0 AND a.`curNode` = 5 AND b.oprState = 0 GROUP BY c.id,c.`prdNo`,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`prdName`,d.`colorName`,d.`colorNo`) r LEFT JOIN t_store s ON r.id = s.prdId AND r.colorId = s.`prdColorId` WHERE r.prdNo LIKE ? ORDER BY REPLACE(r.`prdNo`,'16','99') ASC

SELECT c.id,c.`prdNo`,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`prdName`,d.id colorId, d.`colorName`,d.`colorNo`,c.`mtlQty`,SUM(b.`prdNum`) prdNum,SUM(b.`subTotal`) subTotal,SUM(b.`ns`) ns, SUM(b.`nm`) nm,SUM(b.`nl`) nl,SUM(b.`nxl`) nxl,SUM(b.`nxxl`) nxxl,GROUP_CONCAT(b.id) its FROM r_order a,r_orderitem b,c_product c,c_product_color d WHERE a.id = b.orderId AND b.`prdId` = c.`Id` AND b.`prdColorId` = d.`Id` AND d.`isVaild` = 0 AND a.`oprState` = 0 AND a.`curNode` = 5 AND b.oprState = 0 and b.mntState = 0 AND c.prdNo LIKE ? GROUP BY c.id,c.`prdNo`,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`prdName`,d.`colorName`,d.`colorNo`,c.`mtlQty` ORDER BY REPLACE(c.`prdNo`,'16','99') ASC

SELECT c.id,c.`prdNo`,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`prdName`,d.id colorId, d.`colorName`,d.`colorNo`,c.`mtlQty`,SUM(b.`prdNum`) prdNum,SUM(b.`subTotal`) subTotal,SUM(b.`ns`) ns, SUM(b.`nm`) nm,SUM(b.`nl`) nl,SUM(b.`nxl`) nxl,SUM(b.`nxxl`) nxxl,GROUP_CONCAT(b.id) its FROM r_order a,r_orderitem b,c_product c,c_product_color d WHERE a.id = b.orderId AND b.`prdId` = c.`Id` AND b.`prdColorId` = d.`Id` AND d.`isVaild` = 0 AND a.`oprState` = 0 AND a.`curNode` = 5 AND b.oprState = 0 AND b.mntState = 0 AND b.`Id` IN ( ? ) GROUP BY c.id,c.`prdNo`,c.`prdSmallImg`,c.`prdName`,d.`colorName`,d.`colorNo`,c.`mtlQty` ORDER BY REPLACE(c.`prdNo`,'16','99') ASC

SELECT * from (select o.id,o.name orderNo,o.curNode,fn.nodeName,o.custName,o.totalPrd,o.totalPay, o.staffId,f.name as creator ,o.curOperator,f1.name as curOper,o.timestamp,o.oprState from r_order o INNER JOIN f_flownode fn on o.curNode = fn.id INNER JOIN p_staff f on f.Id = o.staffId LEFT JOIN p_staff f1 on f1.Id = o.curOperator ORDER BY O.`timestamp` DESC ) a where 1=1

SELECT count(*) from (select o.id,o.name orderNo,o.curNode,fn.nodeName,o.custName,o.totalPrd,o.totalPay, o.staffId,f.name as creator ,o.curOperator,f1.name as curOper,o.timestamp,o.oprState from r_order o INNER JOIN f_flownode fn on o.curNode = fn.id INNER JOIN p_staff f on f.Id = o.staffId LEFT JOIN p_staff f1 on f1.Id = o.curOperator ) a where 1=1

select max(id)+1 from r_order
select rf.staffId from f_flownode fn,p_rolestaff rf where rf.roleId = fn.roleId and fn.flowId = ? and fn.id = ?

update r_orderitem o set o.prdNum = o.nxxl + o.nxl + o.nl + o.nm + o.ns , o.price = (select if((o.nxxl + o.nxl + o.nl + o.nm + o.ns) >= 30,p.batchPrice,p.price) from c_product p where p.id = o.prdId), o.subtotal = (select (if((o.nxxl + o.nxl + o.nl + o.nm + o.ns) >= 30,p.batchPrice,p.price))*(nxxl + o.nxl + o.nl + o.nm + o.ns) from c_product p where p.id = o.prdId) where o.orderId = ? and o.oprState=0

UPDATE r_orderitem o SET o.price = ( SELECT IF(prdCnt.prdNum >=30,prdCnt.batchPrice,prdCnt.price) FROM ( SELECT i.prdId,p.`price`,p.`batchPrice`,SUM(i.prdNum) prdNum FROM r_orderitem i,c_product p WHERE i.orderId = ? AND p.id = i.`prdId` and i.oprState=0 GROUP BY i.prdId ,p.`price`,p.`batchPrice` ) prdCnt WHERE prdCnt.prdId = o.prdId ) WHERE o.orderId = ? and o.oprState=0
UPDATE r_orderitem o SET o.subtotal = o.`prdNum` * o.`price` WHERE o.orderId = ? and o.oprState=0

update r_order o set o.totalPay = (select sum(subTotal) from r_orderitem i where i.orderId = o.id and i.oprState=0), o.prePay = (select sum(subTotal)*0.4 from r_orderitem i where i.orderId = o.id and i.oprState=0), o.lastPay = (select sum(subTotal)*0.6 from r_orderitem i where i.orderId = o.id and i.oprState=0), o.totalPrd = (select sum(prdNum) from r_orderitem i where i.orderId = o.id and i.oprState=0) where id = ?
